item.PluginASPCode: <% Dim photoset, photodb, photow, photoh, photos, rndpic, photoconn Set photoset = New ModSet photoset.open("album") photodb = "Plugins/album/"&photoset.getKeyValue("Database")'数据库 photos = photoset.getKeyValue("photos")'调用数量 photow = photoset.getKeyValue("photow")'宽尺寸 photoh = photoset.getKeyValue("photoh")'高尺寸 rndpic = photoset.getKeyValue("rnd")'随机是否开启 1开 0关 Set photoconn = Server.CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") photoconn.ConnectionString = "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source="&Server.MapPath(photodb)&"" photoconn.Open Function showphoto() Dim blog_album, photors, photo_Message, imgurl If rndpic <> 0 Then Set photors = photoconn.execute("select top "&photos&" album_ID,album_Urlm,album_class from blog_album where not album_Hidden order BY rnd(-(album_ID+" & rnd() & "))") Else Set photors = photoconn.execute("select top "&photos&" album_ID,album_Urlm,album_class from blog_album where not album_Hidden order by album_ID desc") End If TempVar = "" Do While Not photors.EOF imgurl = photors(1) If FileExist(imgurl) Then imgurl = photors(1) Else imgurl="Plugins/album/images/noaspjpeg.jpg" End If photo_Message = photo_Message&TempVar&photors(0)&"|,|"&photors(2)&"|,|"&imgurl TempVar = "|$|" photors.MoveNext Loop photors.close : Set photors=Nothing blog_album = Split(photo_Message,"|$|") Dim photo_Items, photo_Item For Each photo_Items IN blog_album photo_Item = Split(photo_Items,"|,|") showphoto = showphoto&"." Next End function Function showphotocom() Dim blog_album_com, photocomrs, photocom_message, photoclass Set photocomrs = photoconn.execute("select top 10 * from blog_album_Comment order by album_CommentID desc") TempVar="" Do While Not photocomrs.EOF photocom_message = photocom_message&TempVar&photocomrs(1)&"|,|"&photocomrs(2)&"|,|"&photocomrs(5)&"|,|"&photocomrs(3)&"|,|"&photoconn.execute("select album_class from blog_album where album_ID="&photocomrs("album_ID"))(0) TempVar = "|$|" photocomrs.MoveNext Loop photocomrs.close : Set photocomrs = Nothing blog_album_com = Split(photocom_message,"|$|") Dim photocom_Items, photocom_Item For Each photocom_Items IN blog_album_com photocom_Item = Split(photocom_Items,"|,|") showphotocom = showphotocom&""&CCEncode(CutStr(photocom_Item(3),25))&"" Next End function side_html_default=replace(side_html_default,"<$Newphoto$>",showphoto) side_html=replace(side_html,"<$Newphoto$>",showphoto) side_html_static=replace(side_html_static,"<$Newphoto$>",showphoto) side_html_default=replace(side_html_default,"<$Newalbumcom$>",showphotocom) side_html=replace(side_html,"<$Newalbumcom$>",showphotocom) side_html_static=replace(side_html_static,"<$Newalbumcom$>",showphotocom) photoconn.close set photoconn=nothing %>
